definition[0]: a girl or woman that you are having a romantic relationship with
note[0]: split up/break up with your girlfriend (=stop having a romantic relationship)
example[2]: I didn’t have a steady girlfriend  (=one you have a long relationship with).
example[3]: He lives in Chicago with his girlfriend.
definition[1]: a woman or girl’s female friend
example[4]: She’s out with one of her girlfriends.
definition[2]: a girl or woman that you have a romantic relationship with, especially for a fairly long time
definition[3]: the person you are married to, or the person you are living with and having a sexual relationship with
example[6]: He brought his partner along to the party.
definition[4]: someone who was your girlfriend or boyfriend in the past
example[7]: I found a love letter from one of his old flames.
definition[5]: a woman that a man has a sexual relationship with even though he is married to someone else. Often used when the man is famous or powerful
example[8]: The president had a mistress for many years.
definition[6]: someone who you have a sexual relationship with, but who you are not married to
example[9]: He was going to meet his secret lover.
definition[7]: the woman who a man is going to marry
example[10]: Rod plans to marry his fiancée later this year.
definition[8]: a man’s former wife or girlfriend
example[11]: My ex looks after the children on Thursdays.
definition[9]: if you are going out with a girl or woman, she is your girlfriend
example[12]: She’s going out with a guy she met at work.
